net.sourceforge.metrics.core
Class Avg

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metrics.core.Metric
      net.sourceforge.metrics.core.Avg
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable, Constants, java.io.Serializable
public class Avg
extends Metric
implements java.io.Serializable

An Avg is a number with an associated count of the datapoints it was calculated with, as well as the associated variance.

Author:
Frank Sauer
See Also:
Serialized Form
